english.segment1: There's a cry in my heart. For Your glory to fall. For Your presence to fill up my senses. There's a yearning again. A thirst for discipline. A hunger for things that are deeper
english.segment2: Could You take me beyond?. Could You carry me through?. If I open my heart?. Could I go there with You?. (For I've been here before. But I know there's still more. Oh, Lord, I need to know You)
english.segment3: For what do I have. If I don't have You, Jesus?. What in this life. Could mean any more?. You are my rock. You are my glory. You are the lifter. Of my head. Lifter of this head
